title: Dairy Free Pesto
directions: In a food processor, combine the basil, pecans, garlic, salt and pepper. Pulse until all the ingredients are finely chopped. Add in the olive oil, and pulse another 10-15 times until combined. Makes about 2 cups.
Will keep in an airtight container in the refrigerator for 2 weeks, or in the freezer for up to 1 year.
I store my dairy free pesto in wide mouth pint size mason jars since theyâ€™re freezer friendly!
ingredients: 1/2 cup roasted, unsalted pecans (or pinenuts, almonds or walnuts!)
1/2 cup olive oil (may need 1 to 2 tablespoons more to reach consistency you desire)
